author: chirino
msg: Scale back this test a little bit.  It was storing 1.6 GIG is message contents. Which took a long time to store and also
will fail on machines that don't have the much free space.  If we want to run BIG tests like that they should go into a
system testing module.  Scaled it back so that only 160 Megs of data are generated by the test

author: evenisse
msg: [CONTINUUM-1541] Fix performed release with provided parameters

author: jaz
msg: added a FileProgress listener to the session when uploading files through the service event handler

author: slaws
msg: Conver the oneway itest to the new node implementation so that it doesn't depend on a set ip address
turn it on in the itest/pom.xml
